causes_communes: Players struggle with attacking the middle

debutant.step: Player A serves topspin to Player B's backhand
Player B rallies and attacks the middle with an emphasis

exercices_complementaires.description: Player A serves to Player B's backhand, and returns every ball there; minor adjustments when going after the middle

metriques_progression: Return every ball to Player B's backhand
erreurs_a_eviter: Covering the middle with their backhands
